body_html: @vrv @jendap On the android slave, the file systems inside docker container have become read-only. This is the reason why addgroup fails in with_the_same_user.sh. This is not specific to to the android tf containers. I'm looking into why docker locks the file system.
body_text: @vrv @jendap On the android slave, the file systems inside docker container have become read-only. This is the reason why addgroup fails in with_the_same_user.sh. This is not specific to to the android tf containers. I'm looking into why docker locks the file system.
body: @vrv @jendap On the android slave, the file systems inside docker container have become read-only. This is the reason why addgroup fails in with_the_same_user.sh. This is not specific to to the android tf containers. I'm looking into why docker locks the file system.
